meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the yellowing of plant leaves due to a deficiency of chlorophyll.
meanings.sent1: The chloroses of the leaves indicated a lack of green pigment.
meanings.sent2: The gardener recognized the chloroses on the plant and immediately added fertilizer.
meanings.sent3: The chloroses on the leaves made them look like tiny suns in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The chloroses spread through the plant like a slow, fading sunset.
meanings.sent5: The chloroses of the leaves stood out against the vibrant green backdrop.
